title: Start
body:
whoa what here's some text
<<if 1 is 1>>
First Level
<<if 1 is 1>>
Second Level
<<endif>>
<<endif>>
<<set $foo to (1+3*3/9)-1>>
<<if $foo is 1>> // testing a comment
    this should appear :)
    <<if 1 is 1>>
        NESTED IF BLOCK WHAAAT
        <<set $foo += 47 + 6>>
    <<endif>>
<<else>>
    oh noooo it didn't work :(
<<endif>>
<<if $foo is 54>>
    haha nice now 'set' works even when deeply nested
<<else>>
    aaargh :(
<<endif>>
